TA/Petro Benefits They Just Get Better and Better
{!Contact.FirstName},
Did you know that as a TruckersB2B member, you receive exclusive access to multiple benefits at TA/Petro? For starters, just by stopping at one of their 244 locations, you can save $.10 a gallon! You don't have to worry about minimum fueling requirements, and the point of sale discount is automatically reflected on your billing card invoice. It's that simple. There is nothing new you need to do.
While you're already there fueling up, you can also take advantage of the PM and DOT savings at TA/Petro. You can save up to $15 on PM services and $5 on DOT inspections. The discount is based on your DOT number, so make sure your profile is always up to date at truckersb2b.com/myprofile.
Don't forget about the breakdown benefits with RoadSquad Connect. As a member, you receive a $15 discount on labor for all road calls completed by a TA/Petro RoadSquad service truck.
To learn more about your TA/Petro benefits, visit us online at truckersb2b.com or call 866.354.7322.
